abstract: The FiOS Custom TV service will begin on Sunday, and offers a base $55 monthly package that includes some customization.
snippet: The FiOS Custom TV service will begin on Sunday, and offers a base $55 monthly package that includes some customization.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Communications is introducing a television offering through FiOS that gives customers more options to pay for the channels they watch and not for those they don’t.

headline.main: Verizon to Offer Slimmer TV Channel Packages to Battle Streaming Rivals
headline.print_headline: Verizon to Offer Service Letting Customers Pick and Choose Channels
